text: Louise Weinberg (n√©e Goldwasser; born December 5, 1932) is an American legal scholar. She is known for being the chairholder and law professor at the University of Texas Law School. She is known for her "judicial federalism" legal theory. Weinberg was born in New York City. She studied at Cornell University and at Harvard University. From 1954 until his death in 2021, she was married to physicist and Nobel winner Steven Weinberg. They had one daughter. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Academics from Texas Category:Lawyers from Austin Category:Writers from New York City Category:Writers from Austin, Texas Category:Lawyers from New York City
title: Louise Weinberg
